title: Morg bind change?
body:
Did they change morg bind or is it actually just really buggy right now? I first had a draven get hit by my bind then flash out instantly. Then after that I tried a flash bind but even though I binded after flash it threw the bind from the original spot i was rather then after the flash. If someone knows what this is whether it's a bug or if they actually changed it.

If this is a bug I'll report it but I'm pretty sure it's not supposed to do this.
